original_title: Trump tells Zelensky to ‘show flexibility’ — RT World News
article_summary: Switzerland offers immunity to Vladimir Putin for potential Ukraine peace talks, defying an International Criminal Court warrant. The Swiss Foreign Minister Ignazio Cassis stated that Putin could attend peace talks on Swiss soil without fear of arrest, as long as the talks were for peace and not personal reasons. The possibility of a peace summit in Switzerland has been raised by French President Emmanuel Macron.</s>
